# simStateSpace

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

## Description

Provides a streamlined and user-friendly framework for simulating data
in state space models, particularly when the number of subjects/units
(n) exceeds one, a scenario commonly encountered in social and
behavioral sciences. This package was designed to generate data for the
simulations performed in Pesigan, Russell, and Chow (2025:
<https://doi.org/10.1037/met0000779>).

## Installation

You can install the CRAN release of `simStateSpace` with:

``` r

install.packages("simStateSpace")
```

You can install the development version of `simStateSpace` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace) with:

``` r

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/simStateSpace")
```

## More Information

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/simStateSpace) for
package documentation.

## Citation

To cite `simStateSpace` in publications, please cite Pesigan et al.
(2025).

## References

Pesigan, I. J. A., Russell, M. A., & Chow, S.-M. (2025). Inferences and
effect sizes for direct, indirect, and total effects in continuous-time
mediation models. *Psychological Methods*.
<https://doi.org/10.1037/met0000779>

R Core Team. (2025). *R: A language and environment for statistical
computing*. R Foundation for Statistical Computing.
<https://www.R-project.org/>

# Package index

## State Space Model

- [`ProjectToStability()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/ProjectToStability.md)
  : Project Matrix to Stability
- [`SSMCovEta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SSMCovEta.md)
  : Steady-State Covariance Matrix for the Latent Variables in the State
  Space Model
- [`SSMCovY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SSMCovY.md)
  : Steady-State Covariance Matrix for the Observed Variables in the
  State Space Model
- [`SSMMeanEta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SSMMeanEta.md)
  : Steady-State Mean Vector for the Latent Variables in the State Space
  Model
- [`SSMMeanY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SSMMeanY.md)
  : Steady-State Mean Vector for the Observed Variables in the State
  Space Model
- [`SimAlphaN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimAlphaN.md)
  : Simulate Intercept Vectors in a Discrete-Time Vector Autoregressive
  Model from the Multivariate Normal Distribution
- [`SimBetaN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimBetaN.md)
  : Simulate Transition Matrices from the Multivariate Normal
  Distribution
- [`SimBetaN2()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimBetaN2.md)
  : Simulate Transition Matrices from the Multivariate Normal
  Distribution and Project to Stability
- [`SimBetaNCovariate()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimBetaNCovariate.md)
  : Simulate Transition Matrices with a Covariate from the Multivariate
  Normal Distribution
- [`SimCovDiagN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimCovDiagN.md)
  : Simulate Diagonal Covariance Matrices from the Multivariate Normal
  Distribution
- [`SimCovN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimCovN.md)
  : Simulate Covariance Matrices from the Multivariate Normal
  Distribution
- [`SimIotaN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimIotaN.md)
  : Simulate Intercept Vectors in a Continuous-Time Vector
  Autoregressive Model from the Multivariate Normal Distribution
- [`SimNuN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimNuN.md)
  : Simulate Intercept Vectors in a Discrete-Time Vector Autoregressive
  Model from the Multivariate Normal Distribution
- [`SimSSMFixed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMFixed.md)
  : Simulate Data from a State Space Model (Fixed Parameters)
- [`SimSSMIVary()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMIVary.md)
  : Simulate Data from a State Space Model (Individual-Varying
  Parameters)
- [`SpectralRadius()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SpectralRadius.md)
  : Spectral Radius
- [`TestStationarity()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestStationarity.md)
  : Test Stationarity

## Growth Curve Model

- [`SimSSMLinGrowth()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMLinGrowth.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Linear Growth Curve Model
- [`SimSSMLinGrowthIVary()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMLinGrowthIVary.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Linear Growth Curve Model (Individual-Varying
  Parameters)

## Vector Autoregressive Model

- [`SimSSMVARFixed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMVARFixed.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Vector Autoregressive Model (Fixed
  Parameters)
- [`SimSSMVARIVary()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMVARIVary.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Vector Autoregressive Model
  (Individual-Varying Parameters)

## Linear Stochastic Differential Equation Model

- [`LinSDE2SSM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/LinSDE2SSM.md)
  : Convert Parameters from the Linear Stochastic Differential Equation
  Model to State Space Model Parameterization
- [`LinSDECovEta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/LinSDECovEta.md)
  : Steady-State Covariance Matrix for the Latent Variables in the
  Linear Stochastic Differential Equation Model
- [`LinSDECovY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/LinSDECovY.md)
  : Steady-State Covariance Matrix for the Observed Variables in the
  Linear Stochastic Differential Equation Model
- [`LinSDEMeanEta()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/LinSDEMeanEta.md)
  : Steady-State Mean Vector for the Latent Variables in the Linear
  Stochastic Differential Equation Model
- [`LinSDEMeanY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/LinSDEMeanY.md)
  : Steady-State Mean Vector for the Observed Variables in the Linear
  Stochastic Differential Equation Model
- [`ProjectToHurwitz()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/ProjectToHurwitz.md)
  : Project Matrix to Hurwitz Stability
- [`SimPhiN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimPhiN.md)
  : Simulate Random Drift Matrices from the Multivariate Normal
  Distribution
- [`SimPhiN2()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimPhiN2.md)
  : Simulate Random Drift Matrices from the Multivariate Normal
  Distribution and Project to Hurwitz
- [`SimPhiNCovariate()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimPhiNCovariate.md)
  : Simulate Random Drift Matrices with a Covariate from the
  Multivariate Normal Distribution
- [`SimSSMLinSDEFixed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMLinSDEFixed.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Linear Stochastic Differential Equation Model
  using a State Space Model Parameterization (Fixed Parameters)
- [`SimSSMLinSDEIVary()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMLinSDEIVary.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Linear Stochastic Differential Equation Model
  using a State Space Model Parameterization (Individual-Varying
  Parameters)
- [`SpectralAbscissa()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SpectralAbscissa.md)
  : Spectral Abscissa
- [`TestPhi()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestPhi.md)
  : Test the Drift Matrix
- [`TestPhiHurwitz()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestPhiHurwitz.md)
  : Test Hurwitz Stability of a Drift Matrix
- [`TestStability()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestStability.md)
  : Test Stability

## Ornstein–Uhlenbeck Model

- [`SimSSMOUFixed()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMOUFixed.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Ornstein–Uhlenbeck Model using a State Space
  Model Parameterization (Fixed Parameters)
- [`SimSSMOUIVary()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/SimSSMOUIVary.md)
  : Simulate Data from the Ornstein–Uhlenbeck Model using a State Space
  Model Parameterization (Individual-Varying Parameters)

## Transformation

- [`LinSDE2SSM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/LinSDE2SSM.md)
  : Convert Parameters from the Linear Stochastic Differential Equation
  Model to State Space Model Parameterization

## Tests

- [`TestPhi()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestPhi.md)
  : Test the Drift Matrix
- [`TestPhiHurwitz()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestPhiHurwitz.md)
  : Test Hurwitz Stability of a Drift Matrix
- [`TestStability()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestStability.md)
  : Test Stability
- [`TestStationarity()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/TestStationarity.md)
  : Test Stationarity

## Methods

- [`as.data.frame(`*`<simstatespace>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/as.data.frame.simstatespace.md)
  :

  Coerce an Object of Class `simstatespace` to a Data Frame

- [`as.matrix(`*`<simstatespace>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/as.matrix.simstatespace.md)
  :

  Coerce an Object of Class `simstatespace` to a Matrix

- [`plot(`*`<simstatespace>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/plot.simstatespace.md)
  :

  Plot Method for an Object of Class `simstatespace`

- [`print(`*`<simstatespace>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/simStateSpace/reference/print.simstatespace.md)
  :

  Print Method for an Object of Class `simstatespace`
